original_text: And Eleazar the son of Aaron died, and they buried him at Gibeah, the town of Phinehas his son, which had been given him in the hill country of Ephraim.
korean_text: 아론의 아들 엘르아살도 죽으매 그들이 그를 그의 아들 비느하스가 에브라임 산지에서 받은 산에 장사하였더라

sentences.original_text: And Eleazar the son of Aaron died
and they buried him at Gibeah
the town of Phinehas his son
which had been given him in the hill country of Ephraim
sentences.korean_translation: 그 성읍은 에브라임 산지에서 그에게 주어진 것이었다
